name: SnowCleaner (NameNotFinal)
description:
Snow Cleaner(Temporary name), or a game where you have to clean the snow off your car and maybe other cars around the neighborhood if you want to get yours cleaned as well. 

A puzzle / interactable game where you need to find the necessary tools to clean your car in this small pixel isometric  neighborhood. 

* YOU CAN ONLY VIEW THE MAP AND HOVER AROUND  FOR NOW * 

The game is in the deciding phase of whether to be "hover around with mouse" kind of interactable game or adding a walking character which can interact with  the environment.

The map is incomplete as some areas are not final / decided.

* CONTROLS * 

WASD to move around the map

Scroll Mouse to Zoom In / Out
